title: Looking into things using scientific instruments
creator_credit: Reinald Werrenrath Jr and Journal Films
brief_description: Shows how to conduct scientific observations, using a fly as a case study. demonstrates how to measure and weigh using small units and how to make a balance for measuring. Also illustrates the use of the microscope, introducing the idea of magnification. Part of the Science fact and fun series. Suitable for upper primary level.
